Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41723 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41723 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-15, affected by CVE-2022-41723
